title: Chainlink and Validation Cloud Collaborate to Power Institutional DeFi With Cross-Chain Interoperability and AI
description: NEW YORK, Nov. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, Chainlink and Validation Cloud announced a collaboration between Mavrik, Validation Cloud’s domain-specific AI engine, and Chainlink’s Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP). The collaboration seeks to connect artificial intelligence and cross-chain connectivity to redefine how institutions understand, navigate, and move digital assets across networks.

title: Bridging AI and Academia: How Research Labs Power Startup InnovationBridging AI and Academia: How Research Labs Power Startup Innovation
description: The line between academia and the startup world has never been thinner, especially when it comes to artificial intelligence. Some of today’s most transformative AI innovations begin as experiments in university labs, nurtured by years of theoretical exploration and curiosity-driven research. But the story doesn’t end in the lab. Ambitious founders spot the commercial potential, […]

title: India-Israel Forge Stronger Defence Ties with New Pact
description: India and Israel have signed a defence pact in Tel Aviv to enhance cooperation in advanced technologies and weapon systems. The agreement aims to deepen strategic ties through co-development, artificial intelligence, and cyber security initiatives, further bolstering their longstanding defence relationship based on mutual trust.
content: India and Israel have taken a significant step forward in strengthening their strategic defence ties, as the two nations inked a crucial defence pact on Tuesday in Tel Aviv. The agreement focuses on sharing advanced technologies and enhancing co-deve... [774 chars]

title: Three health tech innovators push boundaries to build a brighter future of cardiovascular care
description: As digital health technologies gain momentum, research is finding that more people are open to artificial intelligence (AI) supported health interventions when those are backed by clinical expertise and rooted in evidence-based guidelines.

title: Michael Burry bets big against AI giants, predicting a crash like 2008 housing market
description: Michael Burry placed a $1.1billion bet that heavy hitter artificial intelligence companies Nvidia and Palantir will see a fall in their their share values.
content: The man who successfully predicted the 2008 U.S. housing market crash is now betting $1.1billion that heavy hitter artificial intelligence companies Nvidia and Palantir will see a fall in their their share values, amplifying concerns that the AI sect... [2339 chars]

title: China’s Security State Sells an A.I. Dream
description: China’s new national drive to embrace artificial intelligence is also giving the authorities new ways to monitor and control its citizens.
content:

title: Generation AI: young Aussies likely to use chatbots
description: More Australians are using artificial intelligence tools but your reliance on them could depend on your age, your occupation and even your language.
content:
Your use of artificial intelligence technology might depend on your age, with research showing younger Australians are turning to chatbots in higher numbers than their parents and grandparents.

title: Musk proposes PV-powered AI satellite network to fight global warming
description: Elon Musk says a constellation of solar-powered artificial intelligence satellites could regulate the planet’s energy balance and limit global warming.
